definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
"house on a cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 53), occurring in 店, 序, 底 etc
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams

sentences.english: A:How long does it take to get to Times Square by subway?
sentences.chinese: 搭地铁到时代广场需要多长时间？

sentences.english: Then it was on to Times Square.
sentences.chinese: 然后他们又来到时代广场。

sentences.english: The owners of a building on Times Square held that first party on top of their building.
sentences.chinese: 时代广场的楼房业主在楼顶上举行了第一次派对。

sentences.english: Huaihai road business district of Shanghai Times Square, and so on.
sentences.chinese: 淮海路商圈的大上海时代广场等等。

sentences.english: A woman walks through Times Square on a cell phone at 12:34, in New York, Oct. 4, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 一个女人说着电话穿过时代广场。

sentences.english: The super high-rise New Times plaza structure is the symbol building in Shekou, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 超高层建筑新时代广场是深圳蛇口的标志性建筑。

sentences.english: Above, a wounded demonstrator lies on the ground in Tahrir Square.
sentences.chinese: 上图中，一位受伤的示威者躺在时代广场的地上。

sentences.english: Hogwarts Express at Times Square Hong Kong, the Muggle World.
sentences.chinese: 霍格华兹特快列车到达麻瓜世界的香港时代广场。

sentences.english: Above, anti-Mubarak demonstrators gather in Tahrir Square.
sentences.chinese: 上图，反对穆巴拉克的示威者在时代广场集合。

sentences.english: It is placed on top of the flagpole on the roof of One Times Square.
sentences.chinese: 这是放置在旗杆顶部的一时代广场的屋顶。

sentences.english: Spend New Years Eve in Times Square.
sentences.chinese: 在时代广场度过大年夜。

sentences.english: She went to Times Square and Rockefeller Center, where she elicited cheers, waves and shocked stares.
sentences.chinese: 她前往时代广场和洛克菲勒中心，引发阵阵轰动。

sentences.english: A footbridge at 3/F connecting Tuen Mun Trend Plaza.
sentences.chinese: 位于3樓的行人天桥連接屯门时代广场。

sentences.english: A horse-drawn carriage takes passengers on a ride in Times Square at 12:22 a.m., in New York, Oct. 4, 2011.
sentences.chinese: 一辆马车拉着旅客疾驶过时代广场。

sentences.english: Can you tell us about Times Square?
sentences.chinese: 你可以跟我们讲讲时代广场吗？

definition: Manhattan island/Manhattan borough of New York City
(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)
World Trade Organization (WTO)/abbr. for 世界貿易組織|世界贸易组织
shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1
